title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is opened and the user right clicks on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is displayed. This menu should allow the user to add breakpoints, marks, and other options.
EB: When a Java editor is opened, right clicking on the left vertical ruler should display a popup menu. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, and other functionality to the ruler.
SR:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right click on the left vertical ruler.
3. Observe that no popup menu is displayed.
4. The expected behavior is that a popup menu with options to add breakpoints, marks, and other functionality should be displayed.
